content:
Hey everyone, I'm Matt. I'm hoping to learn more about Rust and the people behind it.

If there are any tasks I can help with please let me know. I'm happy to help with whatever I can.

If you want to work on Rust itself (compiler, std, docs, books, ...) there are the E-easy and E-mentor tag on issues, those are good first issues to help you get started. There is also the dev guide: https://rustc-dev-guide.rust-lang.org/about-this-guide.html which gives lots of informations
Thanks for the info! I'll definitely start by reading the dev guide and checking those tags.
